body:
Hallow! I have been gone for a while only playing for 30 minutes or less. I am now officially back and I will try to regain my leaderboard position, but that matters less I wish to return to fully enjoy Avicore and return to this awesome community. I honestly cannot find a better community out there (or maybe you must be a long time player to fully see the community). 

Also this is my last attempt at a AMA, after 5 failed attempts to get questions I try to again :P 

- Mine50Craft760

title: Hi! AMA/Note

replies.body: If you had a million dollars what would you do with it???
replies.body_tagged: If you had a million dollars what would you do with it???

replies.body: Gamble it in a smart way. As in buying something that can generate more value than it's worth. Like a popular theme park or something of the sorts.
